-- 스탠다드 장바구니 -- select lf.LF_ID, lf.LF_NAME, lf.LF_ST_COIN, lf.LF_IMG_MAIN, lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID, lf_opt.LF_OPT_NAME, lf_brand.LF_BRAND_NAME, s.STOCK_AMOUNT from cart c join LLIFEFURNITURE lf on c.LF_ID = lf.LF_ID join LFURNITUREOPTION lf_opt on c.LF_OPT_ID = lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID join LFURNITUREBRAND lf_brand on lf.LF_BRAND_ID = lf_brand.LF_BRAND_ID join STOCK s on lf.LF_ID = s.LF_ID and lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID = s.LF_OPT_ID
where c.M_ID = #{memberId} and lf.LF_SUB_TYPE = 0

-- 프리미엄 장바구니 -- select lf.LF_ID, lf.LF_NAME, lf.LF_PR_PRICE, lf.LF_IMG_MAIN, lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID, lf_opt.LF_OPT_NAME, lf_brand.LF_BRAND_NAME, s.STOCK_AMOUNT from cart c join LLIFEFURNITURE lf on c.LF_ID = lf.LF_ID join LFURNITUREOPTION lf_opt on c.LF_OPT_ID = lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID join LFURNITUREBRAND lf_brand on lf.LF_BRAND_ID = lf_brand.LF_BRAND_ID join STOCK s on lf.LF_ID = s.LF_ID and lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID = s.LF_OPT_ID where c.M_ID = #{memberId} and lf.LF_SUB_TYPE = 1
